projects.title: Aqua Billing Management System
projects.description: Developed a secure and optimized water billing system with a PHP and MySQL backend to manage data and transactions efficiently. Integrated JavaScript-based validation to ensure data accuracy and prevent input errors. Built a responsive frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing a seamless user experience, and implemented debugging mechanisms to enhance system stability.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Built a React.js-based personal portfolio website to showcase skills and projects, featuring a responsive UI designed with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Integrated JavaScript validation for enhanced interactivity and reliable form inputs, ensuring optimal performance across all devices.

projects.title: Restaurant Website
projects.description: Developed a restaurant reservation system using a scalable MERN stack architecture. Created API endpoints with Node.js and Express.js to handle menus, reservations, and customer feedback, while integrating MongoDB for secure data storage and optimized queries. Implemented user authentication and authorization for secure access control and optimized API calls, resulting in a 30% improvement in system performance.
